title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. This is not found when searching for declarations.
EB: The Search functionality should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the Search dialog.
4. Try searching for a declaration.
5. Note that no results are returned.
6. Right-click on the package in the packages view.
7. Select the 'Search' option from the context menu.
8. Repeat the search for the same declaration.
9. Note that the search returns the expected results.
